name: Giant Spider
senses: Blindsight 10 ft., Darkvision 60 ft., Passive Perception 10

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.description: Can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

traits.name: Web Sense
traits.description: While in contact with a web, the spider knows the exact location of any other creature in contact with the same web.

traits.name: Web Walker
traits.description: Ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: *Melee:* +5, reach 5 ft. *Hit:* 7 (1d8 + 3) Piercing plus 9 (2d8) Poison damage. The target must make a DC 11 Constitution saving throw, taking the Poison damage on a failed save, or half as much on a success. If the Poison damage reduces the target to 0 HP, the target is Stable but has the Poisoned and Unconscious conditions for 1 hour.

actions.name: Web (Recharge 5-6)
actions.description: *Ranged:* +5, range 30/60 ft. *Hit:* The target has the Restrained condition. As an action, the Restrained target can make a DC 12 Strength check, ending the condition on a success. The web can also be attacked (AC 10; 5 HP; Vulnerability to Fire damage; Immunity to Bludgeoning, Poison, and Psychic damage).
